thread.title: RenaissanceExciting New FairEntertaining TV Series Announced
thread.title_full: RenaissanceExciting New FairEntertaining TV Series Announced | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: RenaissanceExciting New FairEntertaining TV Series Announced
text:
(MENAFN Press) SALEM Oregon—August 17 2015—An exciting TV series called “Renaissance” was just announced. This skillfully developed show will create a world of warmth and magic for its viewers. The show masterfully weaves a satirical thread that shines an insightful and revealing light on modern lives. “Renaissance” is much more than a television series it will be an interactive experience. How? They will create a fully functional Renaissance village for fans and tourists to enjoy.
This village will be not only the set but a destination town that people can visit. Fans of the show will be able to visit the town and experience the world they have been watching from their homes. They can see the characters the shops the streets and the wonder from “Renaissance.” Their goal is to create a successful tourist town where the long term citizens operate their permanent businesses until the population surges for the tourists in the summer months. However before this show and its town can come to reality the “Renaissance” team needs help. That’s why they launched this . The goal of this project is to raise12 by October 10 2015. The funds raised will go toward filming the TV pilot purchasing the land and building the inn.
To help bring this innovative show and town to life please visit the Kickstarter campaign or. Perks will be delivered between May 2016 and June 2016.
Please keep in mind this is an “all-or-nothing” deal which means if the campaign does not reach the funding goal then the project cannot move forward. So know that any amount given can make a difference and this is an incredible opportunity to be a part of a special campaign! Help “Renaissance” reach the goal by sharing this on Facebook Twitter and other social networks. The more people know about this the more support the campaign will receive.
 
Michael Chock
mikerjc@yahoo.com
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2046156874/renaissance-the-project-the-fair-the-tv-series
